heading: more shooting
subheading: a lone gunman described as a boy scout with a broken heart opened fire at his high school in conyers, georgia, on thursday. six students were injured, but authorities said all of the victims were expected to recover completely. the shooting occurred a month to the day after the shooting rampage at columbine high school in littleton, colorado, that killed 15. authorities said the weeping suspect, who was not identified, was taken into custody almost immediately after the shootings.
author: wired staff
text: a lone gunman described as a boy scout with a broken heart opened fire at his high school in conyers, georgia, on thursday. six students were injured, but authorities said all of the victims were expected to recover completely. the shooting occurred a month to the day after the shooting rampage at columbine high school in littleton, colorado, that killed 15. authorities said the weeping suspect, who was not identified, was taken into custody almost immediately after the shootings.
